admin.create_course_prompt:
Please send the new course details in the following format:

Kurs nomi uz: <course name in Uzbek>
Kurs nomi ru: <course name in Russian>
Kurs nomi en: <course name in English>
Ta’rif uz: <course description in Uzbek>
Ta’rif ru: <course description in Russian>
Ta’rif en: <course description in English>
Narx: <course price in UZS; if free, enter 0>

Example:
Kurs nomi uz: Matematika asoslari
Kurs nomi ru: Основы математики
Kurs nomi en: Basics of Mathematics
Ta’rif uz: Bu kurs maktab matematika asoslarini o‘rgatadi.
Ta’rif ru: Этот курс обучает основам школьной математики.
Ta’rif en: This course teaches the basics of school-level math.
Narx: 50000

success.course_started: 🎉 You started the *{title}* course! You can proceed to the first lesson.
success.logout: 🚪 You have logged out of the admin panel.

errors.access_denied: 🚫 You don't have permission to perform this action!
errors.invalid_email: 🚫 Invalid email format! Please enter a valid email.
errors.course_access_denied: 🚫 You don't have access to this course. Please purchase it.
errors.already_logged_in: 🚫 You are already logged in as an admin!
errors.not_logged_in: 🚫 You are not logged in as an admin!

register.phone_request: 📱 Please send your phone number to register:

help.message:
📚 *Help with using the bot:*

- /start - Start the bot
- /profile - View profile information
- /language - Change language
- /admin - Admin panel (for admins)

ℹ️ Contact the admin for additional questions!

quizzes.no_results: 📝 You have no test results for this course.

payment.no_payments: 💸 You don't have any payments yet.
payment.verified: ✅ Payment successfully verified! Access to *{course}* course unlocked.
